analyzed: kassa iva a vikareyya guyham attha
bhattā bhāra sahaḥ tuvam vade ta
yā nam posā iti chandasā piyena
kim tvam vimanāḥ asi rāja seṭṭha
dvipada ja ninda vacanam suṇoma mā ita

original: Na hi devī aparādho atthi tuyhaṁ”.
analyzed: na hi devī aparādhaḥ atthi tuyha

original: Kiṁ sutvā kiṁ saṅkate mano te;
analyzed: kim sutvā kim saṅkate mano te
iṅgha vacanam suṇoma brūhi mā ita
